phrs.translation: 超过, 超过速度, 超过…速度

sentences.sentence: These hovercrafts can easily outpace most boats.
sentences.translation: 这些气垫船能轻易超过大多数小船。

sentences.sentence: The Japanese economy will continue to outpace its foreign rivals for years to come.
sentences.translation: 日本经济在未来几年内会继续超过它的外国竞争对手。

sentences.sentence: Travelling at speeds of up to thirty five knots, these hovercraft can easily outpace most boats.
sentences.translation: 这些气垫船以高达每小时35海里的速度航行，很容易超过大部分船只。
